Reference

All functions

addFeatures()

Type agnositc version of leaflet::add* functions.

addHomeButton() removeHomeButton()

Add a home button / zoom-to-layer button to a map.

addImageQuery()

Add image query functionality to leaflet/mapview map.

addLogo()

add a local or remote image (png, jpg, gif, bmp, ...) to a leaflet map

addMouseCoordinates() removeMouseCoordinates()

Add mouse coordinate information at top of map.

addStarsImage()

Add stars layer to a leaflet map

addStaticLabels()

Add static labels to leaflet or mapview objects

breweries

Selected breweries in Franconia

coords2JSON(<numeric>) coords2JSON(<character>) coords2JSON(<matrix>)

Convert a vector/matrix of coordinates to JSON format

coords2Lines(<matrix>) coords2Lines(<Line>)

Convert points to SpatialLines*

coords2Polygons(<matrix>) coords2Polygons(<Polygon>)

Convert points to SpatialPolygons*

cubeView() cubeview()

View a RasterStack or RasterBrick as 3-dimensional data cube.

cubeViewOutput()

Widget output function for use in Shiny

franconia

Administrative district borders of Franconia

garnishMap()

Garnish/decorate leaflet or mapview maps.

knit_print.mapview()

Print functions for mapview objects used in knitr

latticeView() latticeview() sync()

View two or more (possibly synchronised) mapview or leaflet maps

mapView(<RasterLayer>) mapView(<stars>) mapView(<RasterStackBrick>) mapView(<Satellite>) mapView(<sf>) mapView(<sfc>) mapView(<numeric>) mapView(<data.frame>) mapView(<XY>) mapView(<XYZ>) mapView(<XYM>) mapView(<XYZM>) mapView(<bbox>) mapView(<missing>) mapView(<list>) mapview(<ANY>) mapView(<SpatialPixelsDataFrame>) mapView(<SpatialGridDataFrame>) mapView(<SpatialPointsDataFrame>) mapView(<SpatialPoints>) mapView(<SpatialPolygonsDataFrame>) mapView(<SpatialPolygons>) mapView(<SpatialLinesDataFrame>) mapView(<SpatialLines>)

View spatial objects interactively

mapshot()

Save mapview or leaflet map as HTML and/or image

mapview-class

Class mapview

mapview-package

Interactive viewing of spatial objects in R

mapviewColors() mapviewPalette() mapViewPalette()

mapview version of leaflet::color* functions

mapviewOptions() mapviewGetOption()

Global options for the mapview package

mapviewOutput()

Create a mapview UI element for use with shiny

npts()

count the number of points/vertices/nodes of sf objects

plainView(<RasterLayer>) plainView(<RasterStackBrick>) plainView(<SpatialPixelsDataFrame>) plainview(<ANY>)

View raster objects interactively without background map but in any CRS

`+`(<mapview>,<mapview>) `+`(<mapview>,<ANY>) `+`(<mapview>,<NULL>) `+`(<mapview>,<character>)

mapview + mapview adds data from the second map to the first

poppendorf

Landsat 8 detail of Franconian Switzerland centered on Poppendorf

popupTable() popupImage() popupGraph()

Create HTML strings for popups

print(<mapview>)

Method for printing mapview objects

renderCubeView()

Widget render function for use in Shiny

renderMapview()

Render a mapview widget in shiny

show(<mapview>)

Method for printing mapview objects (show)

slideView(<RasterStackBrick>,<RasterStackBrick>) slideView(<RasterLayer>,<RasterLayer>) slideView(<RasterStackBrick>,<RasterLayer>) slideView(<RasterLayer>,<RasterStackBrick>) slideView(<character>,<character>) slideview(<ANY>)

slideView

trails

Selected hiking trails in Franconia

viewExtent() addExtent()

View extent/bbox of spatial objects interactively

viewRGB(<RasterStackBrick>) viewRGB(<stars>)

Red-Green-Blue map view of a multi-layered Raster object

  • All functions
